scripts.build: rimraf build && npm run build:all && npm run build:avalanche && npm run build:polygon && npm run build:aptos
scripts.build:all: mkdir -p build && node scripts/build.js all > build/sonarwatch.tokenlists.json
scripts.build:avalanche: mkdir -p build && node scripts/build.js avalanche > build/sonarwatch.avalanche.tokenlist.json
scripts.build:polygon: mkdir -p build && node scripts/build.js polygon > build/sonarwatch.polygon.tokenlist.json
scripts.build:aptos: mkdir -p build && node scripts/build.js aptos > build/sonarwatch.aptos.tokenlist.json
